propDescriptions.ampmInClock: Display ampm controls under the clock (instead of in the toolbar).
propDescriptions.autoFocus: If true, the main element is focused during the first mount. This main element is: - the element chosen by the visible view if any (i.e: the selected day on the day view). - the input element if there is a field rendered.
propDescriptions.className: Class name applied to the root element.
propDescriptions.closeOnSelect: If true the popup or dialog will close after submitting full date.
propDescriptions.componentsProps: The props used for each component slot.
propDescriptions.dayOfWeekFormatter:
Formats the day of week displayed in the calendar header.

Signature:
function(day: string) => string
day: The day of week provided by the adapter's method getWeekdays.
returns (string): The name to display.
propDescriptions.defaultValue: The default value. Used when the component is not controlled.
propDescriptions.disabled: If true, the picker and text field are disabled.
propDescriptions.disableFuture: If true disable values after the current date for date components, time for time components and both for date time components.
propDescriptions.disableHighlightToday: If true, today's date is rendering without highlighting with circle.
propDescriptions.disableIgnoringDatePartForTimeValidation: Do not ignore date part when validating min/max time.
propDescriptions.disableOpenPicker: Do not render open picker button (renders only the field).
propDescriptions.disablePast: If true disable values before the current date for date components, time for time components and both for date time components.
propDescriptions.displayWeekNumber: If true, the week number will be display in the calendar.
propDescriptions.fixedWeekNumber: Calendar will show more weeks in order to match this value. Put it to 6 for having fix number of week in Gregorian calendars
propDescriptions.format: Format of the date when rendered in the input(s). Defaults to localized format based on the used views.
propDescriptions.inputRef: Pass a ref to the input element.
propDescriptions.label: The label content.
propDescriptions.loading: If true renders LoadingComponent in calendar instead of calendar view. Can be used to preload information and show it in calendar.
propDescriptions.localeText: Locale for components texts. Allows overriding texts coming from LocalizationProvider and theme.
propDescriptions.maxDateTime: Maximal selectable moment of time with binding to date, to set max time in each day use maxTime.
propDescriptions.maxTime: Maximal selectable time. The date part of the object will be ignored unless props.disableIgnoringDatePartForTimeValidation === true.
propDescriptions.minDateTime: Minimal selectable moment of time with binding to date, to set min time in each day use minTime.
propDescriptions.minTime: Minimal selectable time. The date part of the object will be ignored unless props.disableIgnoringDatePartForTimeValidation === true.
propDescriptions.onAccept:
Callback fired when the value is accepted.

Signature:
function(value: TValue) => void
value: The value that was just accepted.
propDescriptions.onChange:
Callback fired when the value changes.

Signature:
function(value: TValue, The: FieldChangeHandlerContext<TError>) => void
value: The new value.
The: context containing the validation result of the current value.
propDescriptions.onClose: Callback fired when the popup requests to be closed. Use in controlled mode (see open).
propDescriptions.onError:
Callback fired when the error associated to the current value changes. If the error has a non-null value, then the TextField will be rendered in error state.

Signature:
function(error: TError, value: TValue) => void
error: The new error describing why the current value is not valid.
value: The value associated to the error.
propDescriptions.onMonthChange:
Callback firing on month change @DateIOType.

Signature:
function(month: TDate) => void | Promise
month: The new month.
returns (void | Promise): -
propDescriptions.onOpen: Callback fired when the popup requests to be opened. Use in controlled mode (see open).
propDescriptions.onSelectedSectionsChange:
Callback fired when the selected sections change.

Signature:
function(newValue: FieldSelectedSections) => void
newValue: The new selected sections.
propDescriptions.onViewChange:
Callback fired on view change.

Signature:
function(view: TView) => void
view: The new view.
propDescriptions.onYearChange:
Callback firing on year change @DateIOType.

Signature:
function(year: TDate) => void
year: The new year.
propDescriptions.open: Control the popup or dialog open state.
propDescriptions.openTo: The default visible view. Used when the component view is not controlled. Must be a valid option from views list.
propDescriptions.renderLoading:
Component displaying when passed loading true.

Signature:
function() => React.ReactNode

returns (React.ReactNode): The node to render when loading.
propDescriptions.selectedSections: The currently selected sections. This prop accept four formats: 1. If a number is provided, the section at this index will be selected. 2. If an object with a startIndex and endIndex properties are provided, the sections between those two indexes will be selected. 3. If a string of type FieldSectionType is provided, the first section with that name will be selected. 4. If null is provided, no section will be selected If not provided, the selected sections will be handled internally.
propDescriptions.shouldDisableClock:
Disable specific clock time.

Signature:
function(clockValue: number, view: TimeView) => boolean
clockValue: The value to check.
view: The clock type of the timeValue.
returns (boolean): If true the time will be disabled.
propDescriptions.shouldDisableDate:
Disable specific date.

Signature:
function(day: TDate) => boolean
day: The date to test.
returns (boolean): If true the date will be disabled.
propDescriptions.shouldDisableMonth:
Disable specific month.

Signature:
function(month: TDate) => boolean
month: The month to test.
returns (boolean): If true the month will be disabled.
propDescriptions.shouldDisableTime:
Disable specific time.

Signature:
function(value: TDate, view: TimeView) => boolean
value: The value to check.
view: The clock type of the timeValue.
returns (boolean): If true the time will be disabled.
propDescriptions.shouldDisableYear:
Disable specific year.

Signature:
function(year: TDate) => boolean
year: The year to test.
returns (boolean): If true the year will be disabled.
propDescriptions.showDaysOutsideCurrentMonth: If true, days that have outsideCurrentMonth={true} are displayed.
propDescriptions.showToolbar: If true, the toolbar will be visible.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
propDescriptions.value: The selected value. Used when the component is controlled.
propDescriptions.view: The visible view. Used when the component view is controlled. Must be a valid option from views list.
propDescriptions.viewRenderers: Define custom view renderers for each section. If null, the section will only have field editing. If undefined, internally defined view will be the used.

slotDescriptions.Tabs: Tabs enabling toggling between date and time pickers.
slotDescriptions.Toolbar: Custom component for the toolbar rendered above the views.
slotDescriptions.SwitchViewButton: Button displayed to switch between different calendar views.
slotDescriptions.SwitchViewIcon: Icon displayed in the SwitchViewButton. Rotated by 180Â° when the open view is 'year'.
slotDescriptions.PreviousIconButton: Button allowing to switch to the left view.
slotDescriptions.NextIconButton: Button allowing to switch to the right view.
slotDescriptions.LeftArrowIcon: Icon displayed in the left view switch button.
slotDescriptions.RightArrowIcon: Icon displayed in the right view switch button.
slotDescriptions.Day: Custom component for day. Check the PickersDay component.
slotDescriptions.ActionBar: Custom component for the action bar, it is placed bellow the picker views.
slotDescriptions.Input: Component used to render an HTML input inside the field.
slotDescriptions.Layout:
Custom component for wrapping the layout.
It wraps the toolbar, views, and action bar
slotDescriptions.Dialog: Custom component for the dialog inside which the views are rendered on mobile.
slotDescriptions.MobilePaper: Custom component for the paper rendered inside the mobile picker's Dialog.
slotDescriptions.MobileTransition: Custom component for the mobile dialog Transition.
slotDescriptions.Field: Component used to enter the date with the keyboard.
